metadata.title: CVE-2020-25652 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the spice-vdagentd daemon, where it did not properlyhandle client connections that can be established via the UNIX domainsocket in `/run/spice-vdagentd/spice-vdagent-sock`. Any unprivileged localguest user could use this flaw to prevent legitimate agents from connectingto the spice-vdagentd daemon, resulting in a denial of service. The highestthreat from this vulnerability is to system availability. This flaw affectsspice-vdagent versions 0.20 and prior.

criterions.comment: spice-vdagent package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
